name: Typing War
description:
This is an easy game to test if you are fast typing on the keyboard, words will be spawned, all you have to do is to write the word and hit 'enter'.

In the next update, I will make many categories so you can choose yours and play it,  for example if you are a programmer you can enter to programmer category and words like : public, float, include, create,interface ... will appear for you.

Help me share my game and have fun ..
